hotels.vendor_name: Homm Souvannaphoum Luang Prabang (Formally Maison Souvannaphoum Hotel)
hotels.title: Laos Boutique Hotel in the Heart of Luang Prabang
hotels.description: Gaze across lush green mountains while absorbing the soothing jungle atmosphere at the boutique Homm Souvannaphoum Luang Prabang - a luxurious oasis in the heart of Luang Prabang, less than a kilometre's walk to the town centre. Begin your day with a round of petanque or morning yoga before sampling delicious cuisine at the hotel's Elephant Blanc restaurant. Set yourself up with a book and a drink by the lounger-lined pool, indulge at the expansive spa (charges apply) or maintain your exercise routine at the sleek fitness centre. Enjoy the best of the region, with bicycles available for guests to explore the nearby Mount Phousi, or call on the expertise of staff, who can assist with booking a tour or reserving a private transfer. An unmissable sight within close reach is Kuang Si Falls, located within a 45-minute drive. Round out your day among the vibrant colours of the bustling local night markets, experiencing them from a uniquely local perspective with your night-market companion, courtesy of the hotel.

hotels.title: Five-Star Laos Tranquility in the Heart of World Heritage-Listed Luang Prabang with Daily Breakfast
hotels.description: Experience quiet luxury among storied temples at the five-star Avani+ Luang Prabang Hotel. Spend breezy days by the pool bar sipping modern cocktails infused with traditional Laotian spirits, indulging in spicy papaya salads at the onsite restaurant or visiting the town’s most picturesque attractions via the hotel’s complimentary shuttle service. While monks file past on their alms rounds, you can find soothing serenity at the Anantara Spa.
